mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1995 Season
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gold-Cover Playbill for the 1995 Barter Theatre Season. Shows include: On the Third Day by Joseph Kline. March 29- April 22. Director and Artistic Director: Richard Rose | Glass Menagerie by Tennessee Williams. April 27- May 20. Directed by Fontaine Syer. Artistic Director: Richard Rose | Cat on a Hot Tin Roof by Tennessee Williams. May 24- June 17. Directed by Don Stephenson. Artistic Director: Richard Rose.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
